item.title: 教皇狮子座XIV在梵蒂冈首届弥撒期间呼吁团结和“传教士” - ABC新闻
item.description: 教皇狮子XIV在梵蒂冈的就职弥撒期间要求团结和'传教士精神' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmic0fvx3lxte5cmdnfz3rvrhbxnnjyumzpcgxlyvjgvjgvnbpmi1uaulut0xqqQQQQ 2JVSGGWY0RWOVD2WK5OBUFVRM1LVLUZNHEWNNNNNNWRHZXTF9LQWLYQWLYQWLYQWLYQWLYQWLYQWLYQWLYQWLYS3AMRXWJLMSFJKM254LVBUTWBUTWWWW2VKJZVKJZVKJZV1DXSKRPXZG？OC = 5 target =“ _ blank”> jd vance and pope leo：就职典礼的背景＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijgfbvv95cuxonmpruvdntg9iduwwwb2xxxxqlr2qy1frwmtrkczv25nnnnndfhvm9yavhis011udjvwmffj RTktwaVpnX29lbzFnYXplWVFwcjcwWmV3aG5RQklYakNJTjI4WW9kVnhMQXFqN3RMSUVHc19Uc2w3RG5LMVkxcDBHLUJMNXJOQ2JUNEZXTUVaVWwxSVBn?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>教皇狮子座贾布斯·唐纳德·特朗普（Donald Trump）与Jd Vance一起出席href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmizafbvv95cuxoaf9lmerfvw5merfvw5myuxvmm1pbhpmujnrtej0tja2z3uwytc2vm9qujnvshvsl Tk1OHVUeHFOblExTjFySzJORkZSSkpqX1laN1hNTzJfcjlGamZkZ3ZxQlptMXN3RTYzMXloQUdwNHFQRzlfakRRRWVNM3VaNGtyZmtsRkE4SGJHU0Utd G9iNGdnVThDRlNaNklBTlllSWthSEF3Nl9WQkJEb2JKRFhDLWZOT0VBbTZwNmNBNks3MWNZMTVFbl9LSTAyX3g5dULSAWNBVV95cUxOR3hoOWN5UWpoV UxBZG9QZ3h0VWliYjVkb2IxSDlXQWtVZk9UNHlQM2JocWxHQ2Z4cXFTc204ZWZYMTVuNVE3b3lvNUJsMkhkSWk5TXhaYm04aWVRQy1NQVdJczg?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>梵蒂冈实时更新：教皇狮子座敦促在他的就职质量＆nbsp; nbsp; nbc nbc news href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmisafbvv95cuxpnktru09dm2ozr 1RHUE5HMZZFT2FQ2LDZFG3SVHCMEM2Y2LRRHQWAEXWV1NSZG5WME4XBUXMNXZTTTD6SLM0U0 PMATNOSU9TZ0TLMZIYELVTAM9LCUNHBTJPEETIBFN5RZZMDTNYNDLDU21LMZNVOGNHVMXKCCNL RX0M3NHK2X0RVTURWT0O4R3MZUZNBU1YWQKCXWGLBA0ROSKCTUGXYLVR6TWZAWTBJEA？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>教皇狮子座负责天主教教堂，副总统万斯（Vance）着眼于＆nbsp; nbsp; 美国今日

item.title: 部长“推动”英国使用欧盟护照电子网的交易-BBC
item.description: 部长'推动'以交易英国使用欧盟护照e-gates ＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 斯塔默（Starmer href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiowfbvv95cuxpcm93vhjpbdatsmfbdatsmfbdatsmfbdatsmfsqwxoakvrwnbx3nyswxdlzdlswxdlswxdlswxdlswxdlswxdlswxdlm1bmwdjsmtznvtznvtbbjsnjsnjhtfmfmfmfm qulm qulmtfmfmfmfmfmfmfm fmn jjhtfmfmfm fm URpMEZ1R0pPOUN0SU5PYm1xWXBndzZmb1B2TUpCLVMzV2VNS3B1US0yRjVUMURmM2kwblA5dTRPN19RYTNybG1rcThCa1A5NXJ3Y0hlNHA2NzYyOUY1c0lnamZVS0Roa1Nz?oc=5"部长＆nbsp; href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiuwfbvv95cuxpdgnnytq1t285v1i0m vfeyta2yzlzawdoall4yzjxdjrznzuyvnrmour1awg2cndiauw1nzblr05pr2pztgdilwi2rwvft JvCangyvWy5Mndychd2vzc3rgnvbghgz1nxcxrjr0p0zxnyyupyukhgzxfhr2g2g2cdfimtdeswhoe LDMD0RFQMHOVJDXCDRNAW4TQ3LVWM1JMKYYM0O2M3OXWEHEOG94RE14DEQYWDNRCW1METBR？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>‘我们是最后一个硬院子：在关键的峰会上对英国欧盟重置的宁静希望 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmisafbvv95cuxnwvvjs1bqdtkxr VV1SNL2DW12SNZTCJN6SWCYTGXLS2NNBGPBVFLMDMVGAKJRCK9UTKFNUM9PMJKK5QWK1EVRUB1 o3megwoe5fndnauu4efpuejrsujzvzmdwt1vfcm51qwjqngdtoxh1mtfbqutvovrsmmeymgf ty1bvbxfmanbmsfdpbjdcvw13bncyctnzrnfpzmhaq2xrd3n5rmnmunmunmunbjx1j3uju1va？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”> uk-eu边缘朝着电子，食物和防御上的重置＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters

item.title: 乌克兰军方说，俄罗斯发动了最大的无人机袭击，对乌克兰发动袭击。
item.description: 俄罗斯自战争开始以来对乌克兰发动最大的无人机袭击，乌克兰军方说＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn> cnn 俄罗斯在和平谈判之后发动了战争最大的无人机袭击，乌克兰说＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmirwfbvvv95cuxnd3nfuxfbwnhmn M5SEFVGCKJPA3JIQZLMZUDCZJDYD05XQZDYAHHUZNZPMVQ0DFVWB212SM92D1HTMMC5WF9QD 2VHBU1INDDNTGFGX2XKZ0VYVLJOWTCZRFNRDVF1Q0RHAEJASET1R1RHEJASET1HYBFHYVKLJWXFMSZVJE xlnlvn4vxa1etj4ndhurldkzvm0mznmj2zeo1bkf1odhvmdhvmdlvtthwzzjlawtgadlz？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>自战争开始以来，俄罗斯在乌克兰发射273次无人机＆nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiswfbvv95cuxqenlsakjwrugtsfatuzq3snhiwwwv1cei0njlbdqxxxxxqxxxuthnrg5wckpqujltkzzazazazazazufyluhnausymd zizmdquzzuzfyluhnausymddquzz fat1cxxxxxxqxxxxxqxxx x V9UN041T2TJWMVWZWNBUFVJCLH6CM03YS1BX1Y5MFJKC1B4M3GWR2LFYKQ0BMXVBJFKZ xpenlzvyxnkde5szndug1nsenra0jyamzqu3pfwulgmhazafpfdfdfq4tuhqcuu0c2vpl TVfOE1qQmdyZlhkd9IBuAFBVV95cUxOOTBZVEJtajNfdDNBZEtDaVR1T25DYTVoTmxvM0N6OTVUYlJqX3BxNE4yRnNGMG8zZGRxTmdjak9XcDhpZnBQRmQ5bUVXaWN6TVdUbDdBb 1NQZU9GengtaHg4Y2pWaWJWRG9RZDBVX3RYNnJzM1FFaE1oVTFWcE5uVjBsS080QUtob1pzd3NXS0pXVUN1U2NnYzdkOTlrbl9XSjM1aUNpeW56dnVaWDFLZXFyQkd2ZVdn?oc=5" Target =“ _ Blank”>俄罗斯在计划的Trump-Putin Call ＆nbsp; Kyiv Independent href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmimafbvv95cuxpspps2u4qupfmkkkts3b1vv83sm02ykjbsnu0n0n0n0n0n0pmktqdvn5rjbybffdwuljbybffdvmzpzpmbnjftmbnjftmbnjftmbnjftn5rjbbffdvmzpzpemobobbnjftj yxzjfouxzaoddlt0h1edkyzy1md0jru1dmsnzxcm5sznl1znl1z0rwzg9hvmfpchlztwj PC0JUU3DIWFNNUNBPQ0FZNENNLVFWBJN6DTVFN21OV3ZNBM5ZQWVV0NFFAAA？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>俄罗斯猛击乌克兰，战争最大的无人机攻击＆nbsp; nbsp; politico.eu

item.title: 罗马尼亚悬崖选举中的大量投票率 - 金融时报
item.description: 罗马尼亚悬崖选举中的大量投票率＆nbsp;＆nbsp; Financial Times 罗马尼亚投票会将国家从欧洲主流带走吗？＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 罗马尼亚可能是选举右翼民粹主义者：＆nbsp; nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 在Transylvania中，恐惧困扰罗马尼亚陷入困境的民主＆nbsp; nbsp; politico.eu <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiswFBVV95cUxOcmhpaVdrYnlLZTRKc0JMWW9pdng3a1ZGZWVudW9fcXZDY1NHdnBSbHp4Y1hOTnJoRDh6SUlLWVFXOEpYdHZQZDJS cGheamqxyMryz0J6Of9MZ3NMMLRJQZHSBFRGQTDLVWDZMY16T2C2C2C2RFBHAGPTEFRIWDDDDPRKLBSG LPQ1PMOVJWDDL4TLJSTK45AMZYOTJ1A08XX3PICUP3BEK4EULQLVMXBGP2X0XIOGU5NA？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>罗马尼亚人在紧张的总统径流中投票，使民族主义者反对亲欧洲中心主义者＆nbsp; nbsp; <font color =“＃6f6f6f“

item.title: 葡萄牙在3年内举行了第三次大选，但投票可能无法恢复稳定性-AP News
item.description: 葡萄牙在3年内举行了第三次大选，但投票可能不会恢复稳定性＆nbsp; nbsp; ap news 选举中的葡萄牙投票不太可能产生稳定的政府＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters 葡萄牙在三年内举行第三次选举＆nbsp;＆nbsp; al Jazeera 住房和最右边：葡萄牙再次投票，但问题仍然相同＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者 <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirAFBVV95cUxPdTVKRVBsVEswS1BaelNQVUYxeDk5NU51MXZraTh4Zmp6LVFHb05CbW1fUzNPUUd5RG9LWUthV2h0R0RlQi1 vwkfzdzixvxc4wmhvr2hyqutzsui0veloanoxdkjxdtnysmixukt3bu1ydtvhwm5tuhr6cg hpwdvjsm5vlwd2uuztv1nzekjocks5ufpvshhdbmt1svdvdvetbpvetnzjvjvjdtremwkz？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>葡萄牙选举在紧张比赛中看到稳定的投票率＆nbsp;＆nbsp; politico.eu

item.title: 独家|文件透露，哈马斯想对10月7日的袭击进行鱼雷以色列 - 苏迪的交易-WSJ
item.description: 独家|哈马斯想用鱼雷以色列 - 苏迪处理10月7日的攻击，文件显示＆nbsp; nbsp; wsj 哈马斯入侵旨在阻止以色列和平与沙特阿拉伯的和平。 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmi4gfbvv95cuxnb2i5eg8yqjnxofczz0uyyyldvdzhhrf HRN0TVCNPRDU1XSMK3RE0ZD29IZUTZM3VNDG9RCVDHNETNCUJ2SHFMN3HSDK5GEXVVVVVVVBPBKD6ELPINKTVWLVWLVTRTD CAMVZT3BQMHZHETVLEGFGQ0X0X1RGVHY4CXNKNLO5NJVCYXI2WHGWY2JIB0JIB0JVUFVOVWJPRFO1MG5JMWMW1FBZN6N0L5 wkttvkxqwjfyc3dksu1mmlru1brclznyi1uwe94nnnv2wkhdelzkughpmf9weddweddwvk1icmv1bgpbejnmqxbr？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>报告：在10月7日之前的几天中，Yahya Sinwar说'非凡行为'需要使沙特的归一化＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 以色列时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmivkfvx3lxte5zudnplwq4zu84skxzcxzc0l0qndfr hrra0y1ixwfyym2jzagvjrjvou0qycfvpzgxpzgxprevpztrlsnlltfncmwr2avpvrlbtawzkcfq3evpr？oc = 5“ target =“ _空白”> OCT。 7大屠杀旨在阻止以色列 - 苏迪交易，文件显示＆nbsp; ynetnews hamas文档：10月7日，旨在阻止以色列 - 苏迪和平＆nbsp; nbsp; jns.org

item.title: 以色列在以色列的警笛声中，以色列在欧洲电视网上排名第二 - 耶路撒冷邮报

item.title: 特朗普说，他将在周一与普京和泽伦斯基交谈，并推动停火-Axios
item.description: 特朗普说他将在周一与普京和泽伦斯基交谈，并推动停火＆nbsp; nbsp; axios 关于唐纳德·特朗普（Donald Trump）总统职位的最新信息href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmipwfbvv95cuxomfzjew9udmrywepawftrllnvtbeynbtemvmzut6n2h3mghtv3mghtv3lqzhlct0xscvkk1azd4n 2tUZU1JTHQ4MW5USzlzZmNyM1h6WGtXLVZpSVZhSVBCU1Vxb1pLN3UyckQ3VnJ4cWpYdmp3ZVA1OVU1aFpZOVZVOWFtNlJxek1YM290YkUzRk1mOTQ1dThsMlRqUkF6b 001T29NUlNXVE9JVdIBrAFBVV95cUxOSUdlNXhybmlRSmlvTUhQRWEtYURYenlfRnc0Y0RjVXJmb0ctUlhSNmt2UV9DckFVSXI0WGlJMFlERXEya293WkNqdWZSd2ZzS lBpYzRlbmI4cWRsbk5VbzF1WjRuUFNxclNpcHFwekc4N2E0bmlHZ2RGbFBhdDE5UVlXOFQtZjYxdTczZktXMVd0REJJYXZiQ1ZYLVE0eHF1UEtxb0xRSk5FUklp?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>美国。特使维特科夫（Witkoff）周一预测特朗普和普京之间的“成功” ＆nbsp; nbsp; abc news 特朗普说，他将打电话给普京，Zelenskyy讨论乌克兰'Bloodbath'＆nbsp; nbsp; al Jazeera href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirwFBVV95cUxPbVpacmlGQTV4STVhelZIQ21FSWctdnBTenFJU0t4S0VjYmJYR2dBUDFRbGxxX0pndjQzcUt4YncwLVdkYktJS noywhrqzwrwcgpxmnfithrpmk9nn3rltmpzskrmumlxztcxrhkxavbez2vytdlfr1lwtdzkd DJVTWQ0DNBJY1BSVL91DTVDS2HCCF8YBXY2Q0FQT2PSRZJXUZRPMUVNSKM5DDTI3MDLB？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>特朗普在乌克兰停火上听起来很乐观，因为俄罗斯释放无人机弹幕＆nbsp; nbsp; wsj

item.title: 随着代表团保留在卡塔尔 - YNETNEWS，以色列的“至关重要的24小时”在人质交易中
item.description: 在人质交易中'关键24小时'的以色列括号，因为代表团保留在卡塔尔＆nbsp; nbsp; ynetnews href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmilafbvv95cuxqaetsu29zqlfxbu1oltfvcndoenq2bkxvymzbuefpdfpdfniqkhkm1njzkhen 24TLTVNOTV4N2VJUTZWEEIYCFDWLU5ODTHHAUSZWVVVNLPUOHNDDZVNN1HYQZLPCLBORZL0DKHUR0PQTM1HSXC3V1PQ3V1PQM0RUNJJJJJJUDULXHLNVHJBGXPN EZ1SGI1DTJVLUHK0GGAAUFVX3LXTE5OCKHLSZQYELRPOVRJWHZSMG8WCKL2QKL2QKZSLWDWZ2C1SWZVZZVZZVZZM5Q09INXPTT19RBNVAYVAYVAYLEXZFFFN05GGX0QTRTWW MVHDG45QXDQY3DOT1Z3U2HSNM5TUNLKWKHYZGDRZ0FBXZVLAWRAWRADJJRDGH1EFDTTUGDTUGXSYZETWXE0OUSWSIZZ1BZNKJLAM1BZNKJLAM5XWWN6YZHFZXLQMEE？ target =“ _ blank”>调解人在新以色列运动中的死亡人数尖峰＆nbsp; cnn> cnn ＆nbsp; nbsp; target =“ _空白”>以色列在与哈马斯进行结束战争的会谈中href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmi3wfbvv95cuxon3r1dzh5n2p2v0lqnkxqtlo5u0tic nnmslprm1d4y2vvumhqthvweuxodgndtkhkhkttr6mnl1owd1nhvaq3btvnvnvnvnvpr0y4u3yxcmhrdmhrdmpuu3rmsxzeufntw JRHR3ZNDNVWUNAZQUT2M09XTK8ZCTHXXOUDGMUZKNFDZT3BIVNBOEKTQM2VYQWTJDMTVVV084ODANODANMODANDIM9LAHLANMXOE hvweunccxrfvmxqulzquhzzsng2vghvs2lqallwdwzku01ztuqts001n09qeexdv0hoqtfnqwr5v1hxcm9j？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”> PM的办公室：Doha团队检查潜在的交易，以结束战争，释放所有人质，解除武装和流亡Hamas ＆nbsp; 以色列时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmilgjbvv95cuxqsgsgsgsgsgn6xzhtzhtz3awuuhsx3laehdntfyxdnrsm29codlyrnvqrvp ydelivxjxmdy1lvhscnpibvreb21qmwrsm2fjetzycxhpbjj4wwnawfhnawfhnmvjkbje2evj5vhrxruwzazaznletdpsmstpsmstoxzos184mkkvuqk1dck 9cmuxoyktgnthivucytwnoywrfmxvgzm5vu2ritxjhavhncnvwdjnt3hhnsnlywvlyeddfcxe3ae3ae3aezmwnpbm0ttttt2nlbmpvcwzpoxzpoxzvu 01IUGF2WECYR2RFBU1WDVHYB2FINWFJN0ROCEKTSHJKNJKNJKNJKNJKNJKNJKNJKNJKNJKNJKNJKNJKNJKNJKNJKNJKNJKNJKNJKNJKNJKNDFFUCXDFZNLKLURDAKVSAER2BW1WUXN0ODRDERDRDERDRDERDRDERDRDERDRDERDRDERDRDERDRDERDRDERDRDERDRDERDERDRDERDRDERDERV8ZMZJSTERVQ？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>内塔尼亚胡（Netanyahu）：以色列代表团讨论结束战争，这是与哈马斯交易的一部分

item.title: 大师的谈判者“用言语淹死了魔鬼”：伊朗的核男人与我们交谈-Ynetnews
item.description: 主持谈判者，他'淹死了魔鬼'：伊朗的核男人与我们交谈＆nbsp;＆nbsp; ynetnews href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmikgfbvv95cuxpd0pjqzhhrvbxtxpqn3fyvdvrtffledenje mnjvnn4bhjcemg4Sew4MWrox0nhvgporgvmdwlbqmvm​​dwzjrgl0twy4zgn3bkn3bkn3bkn3cm8wd0uwvlo4wujaahhhhhhhhhvouvzy1jwy XV5CTLRV3ZYRZNREEFFANVFVGH5RDJWAE5YNW84Y05RD0O1VEZ5ZGTWTUJ4UDIBVKFKFVX3LXTE0ZM3ZM3ZOZKRIEEM02YVHBA NZUCVV3CNN3WNRZZNQ3VEDZZWXPVXRLMGNOVHNBT0XFRU1VAVDQOTNTRMLJBGS1QURMUGJMRG52C2C2DDBFRLS09B？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>伊朗顶级官员说，德黑兰将放弃与特朗普的核协议中高度丰富的铀 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqAFBVV95cUxPY1JUQzRXc1dfdV9YcURyWW5NRGE4TXd6LVVZNlNFdlpWd0lScER2MU5rOGZHV2NUeFp6VkNFS1lYejBpT GlXUlE0YXBEMlBlNmVDNnNZY0ZYY084Um5Xd2swc0p3UTFfNlAtczdoZjNSdVV5WnFRZXVNS0tzcURNMmc2QUdGaG9HWktIa0VHeC1hTjFPS2JiaGJxWE95anpxSWFSYkJQQW0?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>伊朗发誓要坚持和平核能的追求＆nbsp; nbsp; bloomberg 特朗普想要达成一笔交易，但它可能比他的支持者要求＆nbsp; nbsp; 《纽约时报》 伊朗没有说没有新的核建议，对特朗普提出异议：'混淆和矛盾的'消息传递＆nbsp; nbsp; hill

item.title: 美国政府各地的官员争先恐后地执行特朗普的惊喜宣布-CNN
item.description: 美国政府各地的官员争先恐后地实施特朗普的惊喜叙利亚宣布＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn 从基地组织到​​叙利亚总统，艾哈迈德·萨拉阿（Ahmad al-Sharaa）的兴起 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmilafbvv95cuxnatbkq2yynxjozk9dadflmdlpz2nhvdbivmu1cdhwwodrrsmvvyjdjcymvvyjdjcy1qmm10s0s0s0s0s0s0s0s0s0s0spophd Cb0JtaXpSZXdTenJJcHRjRnI1bzBqTjBVdlVBclRPRjlFbnYyd2Mxd0tTSEc2czRhV0JoeWdsYS16Y2paQ0ZXRWZ4UC11d0d5MTA3Mno2dnJQd0ZMUGxPQXdn?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>卢比奥遇见叙利亚外交大臣，这是一个温暖领带的迹象＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmi0gfbvvv95cuxpaw5ostnuwffzzhrqrhatrfpjq lhfz1lvdtncmnpqmnngvgytmunqmlzbs1fbzhowetazhd5tv9ywf9pcgjis3jnwunrs0vyq096zg9laeq2t 0lkltetoux6n3hreffvmm5wdxb3dwv4nxbym25yvdbymzfdt093ouvzvxdtajdtajdddddddddddddnmcnmcnbywnlurwtjagpfe jdlawhanzbfcufenwjqbe5kx2jgzuxdvtfhqi1kak1jec0yovntnfdtz1bfttjocfdvm1jrujd2ake？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>他们在说什么：多亏了特朗普总统＆nbsp； href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmimafbvv95cuxnnulunlte1lznrvsutmmzbzmv9mv9mws1nbk FHA2W1NEFYV3FMWURONJZGVZVIY2DWYK9CBHJOWJDSBWQXBK1SBPLBDLBDLXTXETVLD0MJJLQWUXAE9FDE15TKIXRTZXDHC4 ZVVPVKRAADNOAVB000OEWXU2RLOVE5RGLJBGPSX2JYDMC0MC0AKLSZZE0TM01A0G5V9IBVEFVX3LXTFBGSNNTMU9VT2LUS0 E1NWXTCXVCBGRMR1EZRMLUS1PMDZZSTKJ4YWDWA0HGN3ZAZ2PKSJHFEUUHFEUUHCCFDNTWNTWNTWNTWNTWNTWXLMXU4CWZDWFFFFFFFBYLBEYZNLOLOA？ target =“ _ blank”>特朗普承诺对叙利亚制裁的承诺对美国意味着＆nbsp; nbsp; MSNBC News
